joyg.maim.desc: Chance to Maim on hit, slowing enemies. Direct damage will inflict a stronger maim while Indirect hits will instead last longer
death.attack.bleeding.player: %1$s bled to death whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.bleeding.item: %1$s was bled to death by %2$s using %3$s
joyg.mana_on_hit_chance.desc: Chance to gain Instant Mana when you land a melee hit
joyg.envenom.desc: Chance on crit towards poisoned enemies to add 1 stack of poison and increase duration by 1 second
